getClassDF(String) - Method in class jutils.DebugStatus
Get the debug flag value for the given Class
NOTE: This returns the debugFlag for a specific classCode, regardless of the DebugALL setting.
getDebugFlags(String, boolean) - Method in class jutils.DebugStatus
Opens the debug.ini file, if exists, and extracts the records from it that define each of the routines that will be debugged.
getDF(String) - Method in class jutils.DebugStatus
Get the debug flag value for the given Class.
NOTE: If the DB_ALL flag is set, this always returns true, otherwise the actual debugFlag for the passed classCode is returned.
